bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chronic fright wind brought forth by phlegm resulting from spleen depletion. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hou pu 厚朴 quoting Xiao er yao zheng zhi jue 小兒藥證直訣 : 小兒吐瀉或誤服冷藥，脾 虛生風，因成慢驚 , “When children vomit and have outflow, or if they mistakenly ingest medication of a cold nature, their spleen will be depleted and generate wind. Hence this generates slow fright”, writes: 小兒吐瀉，胃虛及有痰 驚 , “When children vomit and have diarrhea, their stomach is depleted and they have phlegm fright ”.
